articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Cantor Sees Long-Term Upside for Palo Alto Networks (PANW) on AI-Era Security. Palo Alto Networks, Inc. (NASDAQ:PANW) is one of the AI Stocks in the Spotlight for Investors. On December 17, Cantor Fitzgerald analyst Jonathan Ruykhaver reiterated an “Overweight” rating on the stock following a F1Q26 beat., highlighting the company’s quantum and AI strategies. Palo Alto reported better-than-expected performance across all metrics, driven by platform consolidation momentum […]
